items.title: Palantir Is Surging. The Stock Leads Nasdaq Gains So Far This Year as Federal Work Expands
items.summary: Palantir's stock has surged this year, leading gains on the Nasdaq, driven by its expanding work with the U.S. government. The company's Foundry technology has been integrated with multiple government agencies, contributing to the positive investor sentiment.
items.content: Key Takeaways- Palantir shares climbed Friday amid optimism about the AI darling's expanding work for the U.S. government.- Palantir's Foundry technology has been integrated with at least four govern… [+155 chars]

items.title: 5 Ways To Keep Your Android Phone Safe During Long Travels
items.summary: The article provides five tips to keep your Android phone safe during long travels, emphasizing the convenience it offers for navigation, booking accommodations, and staying connected. It highlights the importance of securing your device with a strong password, enabling remote tracking and wiping features, being cautious of public Wi-Fi networks, keeping software updated, and using a VPN for added security. Overall, the article aims to help users protect their Android phones while traveling to ensure a smooth and secure experience.
items.content: Traveling with an Android smartphone offers a convenience thats hard to beat. Whether it’s navigating unfamiliar streets, booking last-minute accommodations, or staying connected with loved ones, And… [+6860 chars]

items.title: Ron Johnson: It's Cool To Watch Buildings Collapse On 9-11
items.summary: Senator Ron Johnson has been reported to embrace 9/11 trutherism and conspiracy theories. In a recent interview with Tucker Carlson, they discussed and shared 9/11 conspiracy theories, with Johnson expressing that it is "cool to watch buildings collapse on 9/11."

section.instructions: Give me 5 bullet point summary of new LLM AI news

html:
Your Technology Newsletter

Curated content just for you

Technology

Palantir Is Surging. The Stock Leads Nasdaq Gains So Far This Year as Federal Work Expands

Palantir's stock has surged this year, leading gains on the Nasdaq, driven by its expanding work with the U.S. government. The company's Foundry technology has been integrated with multiple government agencies, contributing to the positive investor sentiment.

Source: Biztoc.com | 5/31/2025

5 Ways To Keep Your Android Phone Safe During Long Travels

The article provides five tips to keep your Android phone safe during long travels, emphasizing the convenience it offers for navigation, booking accommodations, and staying connected. It highlights the importance of securing your device with a strong password, enabling remote tracking and wiping features, being cautious of public Wi-Fi networks, keeping software updated, and using a VPN for added security. Overall, the article aims to help users protect their Android phones while traveling to ensure a smooth and secure experience.

Source: Gizchina.com | 5/31/2025

Ron Johnson: It's Cool To Watch Buildings Collapse On 9-11

Senator Ron Johnson has been reported to embrace 9/11 trutherism and conspiracy theories. In a recent interview with Tucker Carlson, they discussed and shared 9/11 conspiracy theories, with Johnson expressing that it is "cool to watch buildings collapse on 9/11."

Source: Crooksandliars.com | 5/31/2025
